title: CodeCombat
description: A multiplayer coding game where players write code to control their in-game characters and complete levels.

title: CheckiO
description: An online game where players solve coding challenges in Python and JavaScript to advance through levels.

title: Codingame
description: A platform offering a variety of coding challenges and AI programming games to improve coding skills.

title: Codewars
description: A community-driven platform with coding challenges to improve your skills in various programming languages.

title: Flexbox Froggy
description: A game where players learn CSS Flexbox layout by positioning frogs on lily pads.

title: Grid Garden
description: A game where players learn CSS Grid layout by planting and watering vegetables in a grid garden.

title: Screeps
description: An MMO strategy game for programmers, where players write JavaScript code to control their units and conquer territory.

title: Untrusted
description: A meta-JavaScript adventure game where players modify the game's code to progress through levels and escape the system.

title: Human Resource Machine
description: A puzzle game where players program office workers to solve problems by manipulating inputs using assembly language-like commands.

title: 7 Billion Humans
description: A sequel to Human Resource Machine, where players program swarms of office workers to automate tasks in a futuristic setting.

title: TIS-100
description: A puzzle game where players rewrite corrupted assembly code to solve challenges and repair a mysterious computer system.

title: Shenzhen I/O
description: A game where players assemble circuits and write low-level code to create electronic devices in a fictional Chinese electronics factory.
